fields.name: Muffin Morning Makers
instructions: Split the muffins open with a fork and toast them in a toaster. Don't put other objects in toaster while it is on!
In a large bowl scramble the eggs, green onions and cheddar cheese together.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet.
Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and let it fry in one layer as you would an omelet.
When the egg is cooked on the underside, flip the egg over and cook the wet side.
Remove from heat when egg is cooked through.
Form the sausage into small patties
Place the sausage in another skillet. Fry until browned
Turn off stove and remove from pan and drain on paper towels.
Make the muffin sandwiches by layering a piece of sausage and a piece of the fried egg between the two muffin pieces.

fields.name: Ham and Cheese Omelet
instructions: Spray or lightly grease a large skillet and heat over medium heat.
Beat eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Pour eggs into the heated skillet, swirling the skillet to coat the bottom.  Cover and let cook until eggs are firm, about 5 minutes
Top with Swiss cheese, ham, and green onions. Fold omelet in half over fillings; cook for 2 minutes more. Make sure to turn off stove.

fields.name: Vegetable Stovetop Frittata
instructions: Beat eggs, egg whites, milk, salt, and pepper together with a whisk in a small bowl.
Heat olive oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir broccoli, bell pepper, and sweet onion in hot oil for 3 minutes.
Place a cover on the skillet and continue cooking until the vegetables begin to soften, about 5 minutes more. Stir olives into the vegetable mixture.
Pour egg mixture over the vegetable mixture in the skillet.
Sprinkle feta cheese over the egg mixture.
Replace cover on the skillet, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until the egg is lightly browned on the bottom, 3 to 5 minutes.
Carefully flip the frittata and cook until the bottom is again lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes more.  Make sure to turn off stove!
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

fields.name: Bacon Chicken Sandwiches
instructions: Flatten chicken to 1/2-inch thickness; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet over medium heat, cook chicken in oil for 4 - 5 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear.  Wash hands after handling raw chicken!
Top each chicken breast half with a tomato and cheese slice.
Cover and cook for 2 - 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.  Turn off stove when done.
Combine chutney and mayonnaise; spread over roll bottoms.
Layer with spinach, chicken and bacon; replace tops.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (5 ounces each)
8 slices ready-to-serve fully cooked bacon, warmed

fields.name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Pound chicken to flatten.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Dip chicken in egg; then in bread crumbs. Make sure to wash your hands after handling raw chicken!
Fry in butter in hot skillet, turning and browning for 10 minutes or until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Add spaghetti sauce to skillet.
Heat thoroughly. Add chicken
Place slices of mozzarella on top of chicken. Sprinkle with parmesan.
Cover and cook until cheese is melted.  Turn off stove when done!
Serve with a side of spaghetti.

fields.name: Crispy Fried Chicken
instructions: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine 2-2/3 cups flour, garlic salt, paprika, 2-1/2 teaspoons pepper and poultry seasoning
In a shallow bowl, beat eggs and water; add salt and the remaining flour and pepper
Dip chicken in egg mixture, then place in the bag, a few pieces at a time. Make sure to wash your hands after handling the raw chicken.
Seal bag and shake to coat.
In a deep-fat fryer, heat oil to 375°.
Fry chicken, several pieces at a time, for 5 - 6 minutes on each side or until golden brown and juices run clear.  Wash hands after handling the raw chicken! Turn off fryer when done!
Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: 2 broiler/fryer chickens (3-1/2 to 4 pounds each), cut up

fields.name: Homemade Dinner Rolls
instructions: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a bowl, add 1/2 cup of water and 1 tsp of yeast.
Add 3/4 tsp of salt and 3 tsp of sugar.
Add 4 tbsp of milk powder.
Mix until all of the milk powder has dissolved.
Add in a large egg and mix until the yoke dissipates.
Add 2 cups of bread flour and mix until you have a soft, shaggy dough.
Move the dough onto a surface sprinkled with flour. Knead the dough for 1 minute. The dough will be very sticky and soft.
Add 3 tbsp of butter and fold it into the dough.
Continue kneading the dough for 15 minutes. You can use a spatula to gather all the bits of dough together.
Check to see if the dough is stretchy. Knead until it is.
Coat a bowl in oil. Form the dough into a ball and place it into the bowl. Cover the bowl in plastic wrap and leave it in the bowl to proof until it gets to about twice the original size.
Remove the plastic wrap and punch the dough to get the air out, but do not knead. Gather the dough and remove it from the bowl.
Roll out the dough into a log shape. Divide the dough into 9 pieces (or as many as you like).
Take a piece of dough and sprinkle a bit of flour onto it. With a roller, roll the dough out until it is flat.
Roll up the flattened dough into a tube shape and put it aside. Repeat steps 14-15 for all your pieces of dough.
Place all your pieces of dough into a sheet pan with parchment paper. Cover the pan with plastic wrap and let it proof until all the pieces grow to twice their size.
Prepare an egg wash and brush it onto the rolls.
Bake in the oven for 15 - 20 minutes. The bread should be a golden brown color. Make sure to turn off the oven!

fields.name: Homemade Pizza Dough
instructions: Combine the bread flour, sugar, yeast and kosher salt in the bowl of a stand mixer and combine. Do not put hands in bowl while mixer is on!
While the mixer is running, add the water and 2 tablespoons of the oil and beat until the dough forms into a ball.
If the dough is sticky, add additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time, until the dough comes together in a solid ball.
If the dough is too dry, add additional water, 1 tablespoon at a time.
Scrape the dough onto a lightly floured surface and gently knead into a smooth, firm ball.
Grease a large bowl with the remaining 2 teaspoons olive oil, add the dough, cover the bowl with plastic wrap and put it in a warm area to let it double in size, about 1 hour.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and divide it into 2 equal pieces.
Cover each with a clean kitchen towel or plastic wrap and let them rest for 10 minutes.
ingredients: 3 1/2 to 4 cups bread flour, plus more for rolling

fields.name: Ultimate Banana Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a muffin tin.
Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, and nutmeg together in a small bowl.
Mash bananas in a large bowl
Mix in white sugar, melted butter, brown sugar, egg, and vanilla extract.
Fold in flour mixture until just combined.
Fold walnuts into the batter.
Divide batter evenly among the muffin cups.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes. Make sure to turn off the oven!
